job.title: Junior Full-Stack Web Developer
job.description: Do you love bringing innovative dreams to life Are you creative with a technological bent Do you want to be a part of a team that pushes boundaries and redefines whats possible in tech We have something you might likebrbrInterWorks is currently seeking a Junior FullStack PHP Web Developer to join our Experience team We need someone with boundless imagination whos ready to hit the ground running with backend support for our tailormade Curator product Our ideal fit thrives in fastpaced environments and is right at home when it comes to collaboration customer service and exceeding client expectations This individual will play an integral role in laying a strong foundation for this product charting a trailblazing course for its future and dreaming up new ways to
